author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
review: A timeless classic depicting the decadence and disillusionment of the American Dream.

author: Harper Lee
review: A poignant exploration of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

bookName: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
review: A hilarious and absurd journey through space filled with witty satire.

author: George Orwell
review: A chilling dystopian vision of a totalitarian society and the fight for individual freedom.

author: Jane Austen
review: A delightful romance filled with wit, social commentary, and memorable characters.

author: J.D. Salinger
review: A raw and rebellious coming-of-age story that resonates with teenagers and adults alike.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: An epic fantasy masterpiece filled with rich mythology, compelling characters, and grand adventure.

bookName: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
review: A magical journey into the world of wizardry and friendship, captivating readers of all ages.

author: Dan Brown
review: A gripping thriller that combines art, history, and mystery to keep readers on the edge of their seats.
